isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - REMOVE - extended CAB Rear Side Window

svcsubproc.title: Remove Rear Side Window on Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models

step1.para:
Remove passenger bucket seat or fixed passenger seat and if so equipped, full width rear bench seat. Refer to
SEATS
. For removing passenger bucket seat, refer to Remove Passenger Bucket Seat on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. For removing fixed passenger seat, refer to Remove Fixed Passenger Seat on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. For removing full width rear bench seat, refer to Remove Full Width Rear Bench Seat on Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

If so equipped, remove bunk/storage unit from behind front seats, refer to
EXTENDED CAB BUNK/STORAGE UNIT
. For removing bunk/storage unit, refer to Remove Bunk/Storage Unit on Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models.

Remove passenger side cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover, refer to
CAB DOOR OPENING SCUFF PLATE AND SEAT BELT RETRACTOR COVER
.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 105 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Open rear side window latch (Item 1) and remove rear side window seal (Item 2) by pulling it off the rear side window fence (Item 3).

Remove passenger side corner and side interior trim panel, refer to
CORNER AND SIDE INTERIOR TRIM PANEL
. For removing passenger side corner and side interior trim panel, refer to Remove Corner and Side Interior Trim Panel on Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 105 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: From inside the cab, remove two hex flanged bolts (Item 4) from rear side window latch (Item 1) at the rear of the rear side window (Item 5).
From inside the cab, remove two hex flanged nuts (Item 6) from threaded studs (Item 7) at the front of window opening for rear side window (Item 5).

From outside the cab, carefully pull threaded studs (Item 7) of rear side window (Item 5) out of mounting holes in rear side window fence (Item 3) removing rear side window from cab and place it on a padded work surface to protect it.

figure.caption: Figure 105. Extended Cab Rear Side Window on Extended Cab Models

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove driver side rear side window on extended cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 models.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Rear Side Window Latch from Rear Side Window on Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 106 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: With the rear side window (Item 1) laying on a padded work surface latch side up.

Remove rear side window latch (Item 2) from the latch mounting pedestal (Item 3) on the rear side window by rotating rear side window latch clockwise until the latch bar (Item 4) is in line with latch mounting pedestal slot (Item 5) and lift the latch out. Lay rear side window latch out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.

figure.caption: Figure 106. Extended Cab Rear Side Window Latch on Extended Cab Models

step1.para: This procedure is the same to remove driver or passenger side rear side window latch on extended cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 models.
